headline: Concerned About Trump's Tariffs? This High-Yield Dividend Stock Is a Must-Buy.
summary: This tariff plan has been anticipated for a while, and a lot was (and still is) at stake for thousands of American companies and their customers.  How Trump's tariff plan plays out remains to be seen, but some companies' operations are relatively safe from the impacts.  One of those is Altria Group (NYSE: MO).
